attributes.action: Force all Local Councils to provide community youth clubs and activities for under 18's
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There are not enough youth clubs or activities for the youth of today to keep them occupied and off the streets. This would reduce anti social behaviour and give youngsters something to do.
There should be a youth club in every local community

rejection.details: This petition overlaps with several already in existence - http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/youth-voice/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
